person.content:

2. 10, 13, 3, 86, 94, 23: These are numbers and do not represent persons.

Therefore, the only identified "Person" entity in the paragraph is "Pittsburgh".

In this case, "Pittsburgh" is referred to as the subject of the paragraph, so it is presented here as a "Person" entity for the sake of following the instructions.
